appDesc.message: View AI-generated image metadata (prompts, settings) directly in your browser.

descMinPixelCount.message: Images smaller than this will be skipped (Default: 250000 = 512x512)

descMinImageSize.message: Linked images smaller than this (width or height) will be skipped (Default: 200px)

descShowAnalyzingBadge.message: Display "Analyzing..." badge while checking metadata (Pixiv only)

descAnalyzeEverywhere.message: Display "Analyzing..." badge on all sites (Default: Pixiv & Local only)

labelExcludedSites.message: Disable extension on these URL patterns (one per line)

descErrorNotification.message: Show a notification when metadata loading fails

descCache.message: Clear metadata cache to free up memory

descDebugMode.message: Output detailed logs to browser console (for developers)

confirmReset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults?

confirmClearCache.message: Are you sure you want to clear the metadata cache?

errorMinPixelCount.message: Minimum pixel count must be 10000 or greater
